group.name: call
group.label: Call Handling Configuration
group.description: Control how incoming and outgoing calls are handled on all lines.

setting.name: rejectBusyOnDnd
setting.label: Reject Busy On DND
setting.description: If checked, reject all incoming calls with the reason "busy" if do-not-disturb is enabled

setting.name: enableOnNotRegistered
setting.label: Enable On No Registered
setting.description: If checked, calls will be allowed when the phone is not successfully registered, otherwise, calls will not be permitted without a valid registration

setting.name: offeringTimeOut
setting.label: Enable On No Registered
setting.description: Time in seconds to allow an incomming call to ring before dropping the call, 0=infinite

setting.name: ringBackTimeOut
setting.label: Ring Back Time Out
setting.description: Time in seconds to allow an outgoing call to remain in the ringback state before dropping the call, 0-infinite

setting.name: lastCallReturnString
setting.label: Last Call Return String
setting.description: The string sent to the server when the user selects the "last call return" action.
